Detailed Description

This class is used to create thread in XINX and count the number of created Thread and the number of running thread.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void XinxThread::run (  )  [protected, virtual]

This function is derivated to incremente and decremente XinxThreadManager::getThreadCount() before and after call of threadrun().

virtual void XinxThread::threadrun (  )  [protected, pure virtual]

This is the new function to implemente for running thread.
